scripts.fix:shellcheck: find . -type d \( -name .autodoc -o -name .cache -o -name .common -o -name .git -o -name .husky -o -name .modules -o -name .task -o -name node_modules -o -name venv \) -prune -o -type f \( -name \*.sh -o -name \*.sh.j2 \) -print0 | xargs -0 shellcheck -f diff | git apply
scripts.postinstall: if [ -d .git ]; then husky install; fi && if [ -f .husky/pre-commit ]; then chmod 755 .husky/pre-commit; fi
scripts.lint:shellcheck: find . -type d \( -name .autodoc -o -name .cache -o -name .common -o -name .git -o -name .husky -o -name .modules -o -name .task -o -name node_modules -o -name venv \) -prune -o -type f \( -name \*.sh -o -name \*.sh.j2 \) -print0 | xargs -0 -r -n1 shellcheck
scripts.misc:markdown-links: find . -type d \( -name .autodoc -o -name .cache -o -name .common -o -name .git -o -name .husky -o -name .modules -o -name .task -o -name node_modules -o -name venv \) -prune -o -type f \( -name \*.md \) -print0 | xargs -0 -r -n1 markdown-link-check

blueprint.name: Android Studio
blueprint.overview: [Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio) is the official integrated development environment for Google's Android operating system, built on JetBrains' IntelliJ IDEA software and designed specifically for Android development.
blueprint.title: Android Studio - An IDE for Android Development
requirements: Ensures Snap is installed and properly configured on Linux systems
Installs Homebrew (a package management system) on macOS and Linux systems
